Package views

Class AdminView

java.lang.Object
views.AdminView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdministratorView
public class AdminView extends Object implements IAdministratorView
The AdminView class implements the IAdministratorView interface and provides methods for displaying administrator-related views and gathering user input.
